# X

**Type Property**

Align an affected node such that its x-axis is always parallel to that of the view, leaving it free to rotate otherwise.

## Declaration

```swift
static var X: SCNBillboardAxis { get }
```

## Constants

- **Y**: Align an affected node such that its y-axis is always parallel to that of the view, leaving it free to rotate otherwise.
- **Z**: Align an affected node such that its z-axis is always perpendicular to the viewing plane, leaving it free to rotate otherwise.
- **all**: Align an affected node such that its orientation always matches that of the view.
